text: Bruno Kreisky (January 22, 1911 â€“ July 29, 1990) served as Chancellor of Austria from 1970 to 1983. He is remembered in Austria as one of the people who helped shape the Austrian State Treaty. This treaty is the foundation of modern-day Austria. It was signed in 1955. Kreisky was of Jewish descent. He was born and died in Vienna. == References == Category:1911 births Category:1990 deaths Category:Austrian Jews Category:Chancellors of Austria Category:Government ministers of Austria Category:Jewish politicians Category:Politicians from Vienna
title: Bruno Kreisky
